Aliyesha is India's Privacy focused platform. Privacy is a human right but is abused openly on the internet. Surveillance based capitalism needs to stop.

Everyone has something to hide, that is core to human values.

We challenge the status quo, we are different.

It is a small step to bring up a platform where end user is not a commodity and truly respected the way internet should have been but alas greed always takes over ethical humane values.
